Interface GildorymClassesPlugin

public interface GildorymClassesPlugin

Represents a classes plugin

isClassSkill

boolean isClassSkill(Class clazz,
                     Skill skill)
Gets whether a skill is a class skill for a given class

Parameters:
clazz - the class
skill - the skill
Returns:
true if the skill is a class skill for the given class, false if the skill is a cross-class skill
